DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to establish a platform of detecting and sorting circulating tumor stem cells from peripheral blood in HCC patients; to investigate the relationship between circulating tumor stem cells and their effects on postoperative recurrence and metastasis, in order to provide a new therapeutic target for hepatocellular carcinoma treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Circulating Tumor Stem Cells and the Clinical Pathology
